name: Edgewood Food Bank
description: Every Thursday at the Edgewood campus at 1801 Vicente Street, San Francisco from 12:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m, the Edgewood Food Bank sets up and families enrolled in Edgewood programs can pick up supplemental grocery boxes.
fullDescription: Every Thursday at the Edgewood campus at 1801 Vicente Street, San Francisco from 12:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m, the Edgewood Food Bank sets up and families enrolled in Edgewood programs can pick up supplemental grocery boxes.

agency: Edgewood Center for Children and Families
